special_text:
Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
[level 3] You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed creature’s mana value. Put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
notes:
Replaced And Mixed into a Slaw

The rare Lots of Things recipes were generally disliked, and I think this is a more interesting card for green to get.
